Title: Protektor
Writer: Robert Geisler (screenplay), Benjamin Tucek (screenplay), Marek Najbrt (screenplay)
Actors: Matthias Brandt, Jan Budar, Marek Daniel, Cyril Drozda
Plot: A Czech journalist joins a Prague radio station that broadcasts Nazi propaganda in order to protect his Jewish wife. However, as the Nazi rule over Czechoslovakia calls for more and more ...
